duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and lead a world-class team of program and product managers to drive business engagement and expand core product management capabilities.
Manage product releases, prioritization, and governance based on business strategy.
Develop product cost models and analytics to benchmark services against the market.
Provide governance, process, and program management for work intake into service pillars.
Identify and mitigate technical risks throughout the delivery life cycle.
Lead business discussions and strategy alignment for the global workload service direction.
Develop and maintain relationships with external vendors and service providers.
Partner with security and compliance functions to ensure products meet all security requirements.
Participate in the development and review of IT budgets.
Provide leadership, supervision, coaching, and guidance across the team in achievement of internal priorities and goals.
Partner with IT leadership, business unit leaders, and service providers to provide strategic solutions and operational efficiencies.
Work with product owners across the businesses to understand market needs & vision and translate that vision into capabilities.
Drive increased efficiency across the teams, eliminating duplication, leveraging product and technology reuse.
Establish vision, identify, and champion best practices, tools, and ideas to improve execution and quality.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, STEM majors, or related (Master’s preferred)
